SEARCH
Package tripleplay.util

Class PackedFrames

java.lang.Object
tripleplay.util.PackedFrames
All Implemented Interfaces:
Frames
public class PackedFrames extends Object implements Frames
A frames implementation that uses a packed texture atlas and metadata generated by the FramePacker.

      public void apply(int index, ImageLayer layer)
      Description copied from interface: Frames
